bibl.title: Caesar in Alexandria. Fragmentary Latin Dipinti Discovered at Kom el-Dikka.
bibl.note: Latin dipinti in red paint on marble fragments found near the kilns of Kom el-Dikka during excavations of the Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology in March 2008 and 2009.
bibl.seg: Łukaszewicz Adam, Caesar in Alexandria. Fragmentary Latin Dipinti Discovered at Kom el-Dikka.
Latin dipinti in red paint on marble fragments found near the kilns of Kom el-Dikka during excavations of the Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology in March 2008 and 2009.
